sentences.sContent: A crisp white blouse was paired with a slim single-fold black pencil skirt with a daisy for daytime sophistication.
sentences.sContent_eng: A crisp white blouse was paired with a slim single-fold black pencil skirt with a daisy for daytime sophistication.
sentences.sCn: 一件轻薄的白色宽松上衣，搭配细长的绣着雏菊的黑色单层铅笔裙作为混搭日装。

synos.tran: 雏菊；菊科植物；极好的东西

trans.tranCn: 雏菊；菊科植物；极好的东西
trans.tranOther: a white flower with a yellow centre
